Message:
A long horn...
and claws on my left hand...

looked identical to
the witches in my
picture books.

As if trying to escape reality,
I raced home.

I thought that maybe
this was all just a bad dream...

...All I remember is the look of
pure fear on my parents’ faces,
and the Church’s knights
rushing towards me.

“We didn’t call
the Knights here!”
The desperation in my
parents’ voices made it
seem like they were
pleading for their lives.

How truthful their words
really were though...
was something I’d never
get to find out...
